## Data

### IPUMS

IPUMS is the University of Minnesota's Repository of Census and Survey data.

We'll be using the [IPUMS Time Use](https://www.ipums.org/timeuse.shtml) data.

Click on "GET DATA" beneath the section for ATUS (American Time-Use Survey) 
Extract Builder. Under "Create Extract", click again on "GET DATA".
